metadata.label: Transcript
metadata.value: November 3, 1943  Rabbi Leon Feuer  American Emergency Council  41 East 42nd Street  New York 17. N.Y.  Dear Rabbi Feuer,   This is to acknowledge Dr. Goldstein's letter of October 24 regarding the American Zionist Emergency Council which was sent to Mr. J. Goldman. He has referred it to me for reply. I was just elected presidenet of the district last Thursday and in the process of organization was not able until now to work up a local committee. Its composition follows and include Zionist and Hadassah and Jr. Hadassah members:  Office Address Residence  Chairman Rabbi Solomon 53 St. Phillip St. 251 Congress St.  Meier Triest 59 Broad St. 138 Bull St.   Joseph Fromberg 49 Broad St. 34 Parkwood Ave.   Bernard J. Clasov 69 Broad St. Dunnaman Ave.   Sam Berlin 114 King St. 6 Limehouse St.  Irving Steinberg 61 Broad St. 157 Moultrie St.  Hyman Rephan 529 Meeting St. 13 Elmood St.   Marty Chase 414 King St. 134 Smith St.   Macey Kronsberg P.O. Box 102 Station A. 536 Rutledge Ave. Zone 24  Mrs. Joseph D. Read 60 Murray Blvd.   mrs. Jacob S. Raisin 207 Broad St.   Miss Lenora Stine 365 Huger St.   If you desire any additional information, please free to call on me.   Sincerely yours,   Macey Kronsberg, President  Charleston District  Copy to Z.O.A.- Washington
